Welcome to BotBlike!

This is a rougelike, text based adventure game where the goal is to reach level 30! Along the way, you'll fight various dangerous monsters, drink tons of potions, equip weaponry, listen to spooky tunes, and die a lot!

Symbol Key

# - wall

. - open space

M - enemy (bad)

X - corpse (has loot!)

? - stairs (get low!)

 

Controls

Player Control

In the dungeon map, use the arrow keys to move.

To attack Monsters, use the arrow keys to run into them.

To loot Corpses, use the arrow keys to run into them.

Inventory Control

In the dungeon map, press the i key to open the inventory.

Inside the inventory, use the arrow keys to navigate up and down, and switch pages (left and right)

Inside the inventory, use the enter or space keys to select an item.

Inside the inventory, use the x or escape keys to exit the menu.

The same controls apply to the Inspect menu (brown).

 

Protip:  If menus are redrawing incorrectly, smash the x button a few times.  If the inventory is just a blue box with no contents, it's empty!

Protip: After closing an inventory, the map is blank.  Press any movement key to resume playing.
